availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George M. Coffer (caldwell/ lyon co farmer)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Reuben Coffer and Eliza A. Coffer. Married to Susan D. Coffer. Father of P. A. Coffer. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 395B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 499B-500A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Lyon County, KY, June 1863, p. 4.
Find A Grave, "George M. Coffer (1839-1891)," Memorial #67824726, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67824726 (accessed May 20, 2021).
